name: HomemadeHairMasks
0:
”Alexa, open Simple Chic”
”What is the recipe for a hair mask with argan oil?”
”How to make a hair mask with egg yolks?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple chic
des:
Make hair masks at home from the products you already have in your kitchen. All you need is an olive oil, a coconut oil, organic honey, avocado, egg yolks and some essential oils (optional), like lavender, rosemary or organ oil. 
In this skill you have recipes for 5 hair masks which we use at home all the time: a) hair mask with egg yolks, b) hair mask with argan oil, c) hair mask with olive oil, d) hair mask with rosemary oil, and e) hair mask with coconut oil.
After you apply the hair mask, it is recommended to cover your head with shower cap, but this is optional.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
